title: Midterm Disinformation Has Taken Over Pennsylvania
description: One state’s experience underscores how pervasive false and misleading information has become in the country’s electoral process, online and off.
dc:creator: Steven Lee Myers
media:description: A post on Twitter falsely claimed that Sen. Doug Mastriano, a Republican candidate for governor of Pennsylvania, said that Iran’s supreme leader had “the right idea of how women should be treated.”
